General.Name: Tibet Tianlu Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Tianlu Co., Ltd. engages in general contracting business in China. It is involved in the highway engineering construction; general contracting of housing, municipal public, railway engineering, and water conservancy and hydropower engineering construction works; professional contracting of bridge engineering, highway pavement construction, and road subgrade engineering works; and engineering contracting activities. The company also engages in the production and sales of cement, concrete, mineral powder, prefabricated cement components, sand, aggregate, and ore; research and development, production, wholesale, retail, and sales of building materials; smelting, deep processing, and sale of mineral products; exploration, mining, processing, and sale of mineral resources; processing and sale of asphalt mixture; provision of business management consulting and construction labor services; and financial leasing. Tibet Tianlu Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Lhasa, China.
